body.name: Hikonia Handheld Game Console,Portable Retro Video Game Console with 500 Classical Games,3.0 Inches Screen,1020mAh Rechargeable Battery,Support for TV & Two Players,Gift for Kids & Adult(Orange)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 13 mins
features: 【500 Games】Free to play 500 popular games, including puzzle, adventure, shooting, racing, fighting and more. No card to download, no extra cost. If you are a fan of nostalgia, you will recapture the happy days of childhood! Whatever you like, there is a game for you.

【2 Players Play on TV】Package includes game console, USB cable and AV output cable. Connect the gamepad to a small handheld console to play a two-player game. The 3.0-inch LCD screen can also be connected to the TV via the AV output, making it easy to enjoy vivid and stimulating handheld video games on the larger screen.

【1020mAh Rechargeable Battery】Built-in 1020mAh large capacity lithium battery, each full charge can play for up to 5 hours.No need to worry about running out of power when you're on business, traveling, or camping. (Tips: Please fully charge the battery before the first use)

【Portable handheld game console】Tiny and unique structure design, beautiful portable retro handheld, perfect integration of tradition and fashion. Take it with you for business, work, camping, or other outdoor activities.

【Perfect Gifts for Kids & Adults】This handheld game console for children,not only brings fun to children, but also wakes up the beautiful memories of childhood for the post-80s and 90s adults adults and releases their life pressure.An ideal gift for children and adults on birthdays,Christmas or any occasion. The value of this gift will increase over time.Memories are the most precious! If you have any questions during use, please feel free to contact us.
body.description: Hikonia Handheld Game Console -- with 500 Classic Handheld Games The Best Retro Handheld Console,is here! The screen and handle of this game controller are completely restored to that era, reliving childhood memories and giving your child the pleasure of playing the previous games.You may find some duplicate games in the gameboy player, because these games are different versions and have different fun.This game console does not have the function of saving game progress. When you exit the game, all progress will be zero.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enjoy the big-screen game experience at the same time!

The products include: 1 x Gameboy Console1 x Controller1 x USB Charging Cable1 x AV Cable1 x 1020mAh Battery1 x User Manual Hikonia Handheld Game Console -- with 500 Classic Handheld Games The Best Retro Handheld Console,is here! The screen and handle of this game controller are completely restored to that era, reliving childhood memories and giving your child the pleasure of playing the previous games.You may find some duplicate games in the gameboy player, because these games are different versions and have different fun.This game console does not have the function of saving game progress. When you exit the game, all progress will be zero.

Experience the joy of the game console with your friends or family! NOTE:!!!The controller only functions when in Two-player mode.If the remote cannot be used, please check whether it is used in the correct mode. Only games that support Two-player mode, you can played with another person. Once use the console to control, the other use the controller to control, doesn't work in the menu system. NOTES for Connecting to TV 1. Connect the cable controller & the AV cable to the Video Game Console; 2. Connect the red terminal of the AV cable to the red terminal of the television (AUDIO); 3. Connect the yellow terminal of the AV cable to the the yellow terminal of the TV (VIDEO); 4. Switch the TV channel to the audio / video channel and turn on the TV and the handheld mini game console.

Portable and Elegant Compact and lightweight handheld game console, mini case, take away. The best choice for a relaxed atmosphere in airplanes, camps, traveling or on the way to work. 3 inch High Definition Color Screen 500 Classic FC Games Equipped with 3 inch High Definition color screen,mini body, carry it with you. On the way to work, free time, the best choice for relaxing mood. Play anytime, anywhere, enjoy the fun of childhood. 500 Super Classic games More choice for playing, you could have funny game time with kids or friends, have a relax in the spare time.
Best gift for your child, Give your child a memorable childhood Playing is a child's nature, and nothing is better than a toy that allows the child to enjoy playing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for $20 bucks!
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't expecting much but got way more than I thought. Definitelyarcade style since you cant save your progress. It has Dr.mario, ninja turtles, pacman even Double Dragon. Some of them I've never heard of well most of them but I think it's worth the 20 bucks I got for it.
